Reviews.Title: Some issues as noted, but overall she likes it
Reviews.Author: OverHeight
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter to use in Canada on the Telus network for texting only, but it doesn't work on there network, so we switched to Rogers. The charger is only for european plugins. It does come with a North American plug adaptor, but if you plug it in all the way it dosn't work, so you have to fiddle to get it just right. Can't find any screen protectors or cases for it yet.Overall she likes the phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's a good basic phone. Has the main regular features and some. Trying to get a memory card to test some of the other features like internet and so on. It will do for the user who is not into fancy stuff. I dont like how the backlighting affects the keys during the day though

Reviews.Title: the phone does not work
Reviews.Author: teshawn brookes
Reviews.Content: I live in texas and I gave it to my mom who lives in the caribbean and it does not work well at all. she does not receive calls in order to get calls she has to turn it on and off every10 mis the phone does not work . I am disappointed because it was a xmas gift. And I cannot return it which I woukd if I could because it so much money to send it by mail. So that phone just sits in the house ...waste of money and time

Reviews.Title: Bien
Reviews.Author: Erick Palacios
Reviews.Content: Son responsables, dan solución a cualquier evento. Muchas gracias por permitir adquirir satisfactoriamente este producto. Gracias mil gracias. Que tengan el mayor De los éxitos.
